# reducibl.com

> Applied AI systems and infrastructure.

## About

David Crowe is a solo founder and AI engineer building AI-powered applications. He focuses on practical AI systems — not research papers, but shipped products.

## What he builds

- AI-powered apps distributed through the ChatGPT app store (MCP/Apps SDK)
- Inner: emotional memory tracking through conversational AI
- Apprentice: AI-guided art study with 37,000+ masterworks
- Loop, Hunch, Fork: decision intelligence tools for experiments, predictions, and decisions

## Writing

David writes about applied AI, infrastructure, security, and the realities of building as a solo founder. Topics include:

- GenAI portfolio management and initiative prioritization
- MCP server architecture and the three-party identity problem
- LLM security — prompt injection, secret leakage, secure development practices
- AI backend architecture for early-stage products

## Build logs

Daily automated build logs documenting what he's building, generated from Claude Code transcripts and synthesized by Gemini.

## Links

- Homepage: https://reducibl.com
- Writing: https://reducibl.com/writing
- Build logs: https://reducibl.com/buildlogs
- RSS feed: https://reducibl.com/feed.xml
